item.title: Edge Flow and Artifacts Assignment
item.description: Exercises Topology from 4 different planes, create 1-2, 1-3, 1-4, 1-6 polygon strips redirect edge flow on a grid in 3 different ways create a hole in flat grid create a smooth tapering bevel with subd in mind Fixing Meshes Fix non manifold geometry Fix hidden faces Fix overlapping geo Correct Bevel errors Criteria Points Possible Criteria +1 1.
